column4: hi guys, started running Ubuntu last night and everything is going great.  Quick question though, I want to install the citrix ica client and all citrix.com has is the rpm, is there any way for debian to still install it?
so where do I know where it installed it to?  It just went back to the console
dunno, try dpkg -l and look for the name of the package. Then run dpkg -L <packagename>
